tool_description: Soccer match and player statistics from the USL soccer league
name: USL Soccer Scores and Stats
title: USL Soccer Scores and Stats

api_list.name: getMatchesByUslTeamId
getMatchTeamsAndLineupsByUslTeamId
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://usl-soccer-scores-and-stats.p.rapidapi.com/teams/6/match-teams"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "usl-soccer-scores-and-stats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://usl-soccer-scores-and-stats.p.rapidapi.com/teams/{uslteamid}/match-teams"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "usl-soccer-scores-and-stats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
